summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of EKA-AI Platform. Fixed critical AI chat functionality bug and verified all features are working correctly. Backend APIs maintain 100% success rate, and frontend now has full functionality including working AI chat integration.
passed_tests: Backend Job Cards CRUD operations (all endpoints)
Frontend homepage loads with EKA-AI branding and navigation
Frontend /claude-chat page with working AI chat functionality
Frontend AI chat send button triggers API calls correctly
Frontend AI chat input field clears after sending
Frontend AI chat displays responses with streaming effect
Frontend /job-cards page loads with stats and table
Frontend /login page loads with proper form elements
Frontend navigation between all pages working
AI integration with Gemini using EMERGENT_LLM_KEY working correctly
